markdownRemark.excerpt: One small I change I always need to make to iterm is a shortcut to end of line and begining of line. Do add this shortcut do the following: Go to…
markdownRemark.html:
One small I change I always need to make to iterm is a shortcut to end of line and begining of line.

Do add this shortcut do the following:

Go to: Iterm2 -> Preferences -> Keys -> Key Bindings

Edit the following commands to be:

⌘←  "SEND HEX CODE"      0x01 
⌘→  "SEND HEX CODE"      0x05

frontmatter.title: End and Beginning of File iTerm
